attributes.additional_details:
We all know of the tragedy of the grooming gang scandal that has plagued the uk for decades and it's effect on a swath of young girls.For some reason this labour government and the previous one found it not important enough to investigate why and how it happened.

 

Let's force they're hand and demand an investigation

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
